actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 447.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse to be constructed in Greenville, South Carolina, as the "Carroll A. Campbell, Jr. Federal Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal courthouse to be constructed in Greenville, South Carolina, building number SC0017ZZ, as the Carroll A. Campbell, Jr. Federal Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse to be constructed in Greenville, South Carolina, as the "Carroll A. Campbell, Jr. Federal Courthouse".
